title: Bug 42724 - Incorrect Selection Rendering on Bidi Platforms
description: This bug report discusses an issue with the rendering of selections in StyledText on bidi (Bi-directional) platforms. The report suggests that there might be a need to optimize the selection background rendering by avoiding unnecessary redraws due to code in StyledTextRenderer.drawLine that creates a style range for the selection.
OB: The bug report lacks a clear description of the observed behavior (OB) related to the selection rendering issue on bidi platforms.
EB: The expected behavior (EB) is stated as follows: 'drawLineSelectionBackground should only be used to render the special line break selection.' This suggests that the selection background should be optimized and used only for rendering special line break selections.
SR:
The steps to reproduce (SR) the bug are provided in the report as follows:

1. Using build 20030903
2. Utilize the attached BidiUtil
3. Type one English character followed by three or more Arabic/Hebrew characters
4. Place the caret at the beginning of the line
5. Select the next two characters, including one bidi character
6. Observe that the selection background includes unselected characters.
